description:
Finally free to sortie, Koji shows what Mazinger Z can do when its full power is unleashed. But Baron Ashura brings an abrupt end to the unstoppable rampage when Sayaka`s life is threatened.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pincer movement! Mechanical Beasts big strategy!
¡Trampa!¡La gran ofensiva de las bestias mecánicas!
挟撃! 機械獣大作戦!
